title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, selecting Close All Saved from the file menu after creating a new file f1.txt, does not always work. The expected behavior is that all open files should be closed, saving any changes if needed.
OB: When Close All Saved is selected, all open files should be closed, with any changes saved as needed.
EB: When Close All Saved is selected after creating a new file f1.txt, not all open files are closed.
SR: Ensure that Close All Saved closes all open files, saving any changes if needed, consistently after creating a new file f1.txt.
